summary: A businessman's desire to protect his corrupt son's fortune leads to tragedy.
cast: Spencer Tracy|Deborah Kerr|Ian Hunter|James Donald|Mervyn Johns|Leueen MacGrath|Felix Aylmer|Walter Fitzgerald|Tilsa Page|Ernest Jay|Colin Gordon|Harriette Johns|Julian D'Albie|Clement McCallin|Olive Milbourne|Harold Scott|Lockwood West
title: Edward, mi hijo
